snippet.title: NOSTOS Open-World Online VR RPG Trailer (NetEase) - Rift, Vive, Windows VR
snippet.description:
More Details: https://uploadvr.com/nostos-is-an-open-world-vr-rpg-that-looks-a-lot-like-sword-art-online/

Improbable partner NetEase will be announcing/revealing a game built with SpatialOS called “Nostos.” It’s a revolution in VR gameplay: online multiplayer in virtual reality, set in an open world with realistic physics, real-time combat and free movement.

Nostos is a mysterious and desolate world with its own unique ecosystem and astronomical system. Players in this strange new land can explore a range of diverse environments, from desert to snowscape, gathering resources, crafting clothes and items for survival and collaborating or competing with other players to salvage the remains of a once advanced civilization. As they fight to survive, they must also deal with the ever encroaching, deadly “coral sea”, and the creatures that emerge from it.

For all the best in AR and VR News: http://www.uploadvr.com

Follow us for up-to-the-minute updates:

📘  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/uploadvr/
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/UploadVR
